item.title: Climate Protestors Disrupt Chris Wright Hearing For Energy Secretary
item.description: Any honest examination of the Los Angeles wildfires indicts incompetent government leadership rather than climate change.

item.title: Propaganda Press Wants You To Believe Trump Is Guilty Because Jack Smith Said So
item.description: Smith gave the stenographers in the corporate media everything they needed to keep hyperventilating about Jan. 6 before Trump's inauguration.
